contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 30th day of September, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Ali, 608 Pa. 71, 10 A.3d 282 (2010) (providing that hybrid representation is impermissible).
The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to forward these filings to counsel of record.
